itunes:title: #113: The Wrong Side of History (Bret Weinstein & Heather Heying DarkHorse Livestream)
title: #113: The Wrong Side of History (Bret Weinstein & Heather Heying DarkHorse Livestream)
description:
In this 113th in a series of live discussions with Bret Weinstein and Heather Heying (both PhDs in Biology), we discuss the state of the world through an evolutionary lens.

 

This week, we talk about Omicron, Covid, and how public policy has failed to change in light of this highly transmissible but far less dangerous variant. We discuss two excellent essays in Tablet, one by a rabbi in San Francisco, the other on scientific and medical “dissidents,” of which we are two. We discuss the powerful and immense truckers’ convoy in Canada, which is signaling resistance to vaccine mandates, among other authoritarian measures that the duplicitous Ken doll who leads that country has implemented. We show that the MSM in the US is not covering the truckers convoy at all. We discuss Spotify and Substack and Neil Young and Joe Rogan, and provide a simple rubric for one way that you can know if you are on the wrong side of history: you favor censorship.

 

*****

Support the sponsors of the show:

 

MDHearingAid.com: Use promo code DARKHORSE to receive a significant discount off your order of already inexpensive, high-quality hearing aids, plus receive a free extra charging case. Or call 1-833-772-1392.

 

Sole: Beautiful shoes and carefully designed footbeds for healthy feet. Go to yoursole.com/darkhorse, and first-time customers get 50% off, plus they have a 90-day money back guarantee.

 

Sundays: Dog food so tasty and healthy, even husbands swear by it. Go to sundaysfordogs.com/DARKHORSE to receive 35% off your first order.

 

*****

 

Our book, A Hunter-Gatherer’s Guide to the 21st Century, is available from https://darvillsbookstore.indielite.org, (and everywhere books are sold, including amazon), but they have sold out of signed copies.

 

Check out our store! Epic tabby, digital book burning, saddle up the dire wolves, and more: https://store.darkhorsepodcast.org

 

Heather’s newsletter, Natural Selections (subscribe to get free weekly essays in your inbox): https://naturalselections.substack.com

 

Find more from us on Bret’s website (https://bretweinstein.net) or Heather’s website (http://heatherheying.com).

 

Become a member of the DarkHorse LiveStreams, and get access to an additional Q&A livestream every month. Join at Heather's Patreon.

 

Like this content? Subscribe to the channel, like this video, follow us on twitter (@BretWeinstein, @HeatherEHeying), and consider helping us out by contributing to either of our Patreons or Bret’s Paypal.

 

Looking for clips from #DarkHorseLivestreams? Check out our other channel:  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCAWCKUrmvK5F_ynBY_CMlIA

 

Theme Music: Thank you to Martin Molin of Wintergatan for providing us the rights to use their excellent music.

 

*****

 

Q&A Link: https://youtu.be/RYfN9LKhBvk

 

Mentioned in this episode:

 

The Four Questions of the Pandemic, by Dan Ain: https://www.tabletmag.com/sections/community/articles/four-questions-of-the-pandemic

 

The Dissidents, by Clayton Fox: https://www.tabletmag.com/sections/science/articles/the-dissidents

 

One video of the trucker’s convoy in Canada: https://twitter.com/Based__UK/status/1486799851924951041?s=20&t=H_MZeGntrDm3uix1jLNpmA

National Kids & Vaccines Day in Canada: https://www.scienceupfirst.com/kids-vaccines-day/

 

Support the show (https://www.patreon.com/bretweinstein)
